section: Battle of the Southern Water Tribe
paragraphs.text: The battle of the Southern Water Tribe was a battle between the two polar Water Tribes during the climax of the Water Tribe Civil War, in which the Southern Water Tribe rebels attempted to reclaim their tribe from Northern occupation. Although the rebel forces were initially able to overwhelm the Northern troops, they were eventually defeated and forced to retreat following intervention from Chief Unalaq, Desna and Eska, and a force of dark spirits.
